summary: Email correspondence between U.S. Department of Justice officials regarding coordination with the Paris prosecutor's office on the Jeffrey Epstein investigation. The emails discuss scheduling a call to share information about Epstein's potential connections to France.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The prosecutor handling the Epstein investigation in the Southern District of New York, offering to discuss the inquiry from the Paris prosecutor's office.

persons.name: DOJ Attaché/Magistrat de liaison américain U.S. Embassy, Paris
persons.context: The DOJ official at the U.S. Embassy in Paris who received an inquiry from the Paris prosecutor's office about Epstein's potential connections to France and is seeking to connect with the SDNY prosecutors.

connections.person1: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
connections.person2: DOJ Attaché/Magistrat de liaison américain U.S. Embassy, Paris
connections.description: Colleagues within the U.S. Department of Justice coordinating on the Epstein investigation, specifically regarding international cooperation with French authorities.

events.title: Scheduled call about Epstein investigation
events.description: A call scheduled for Tuesday, August 20, 2019, at 10:30am Eastern time to discuss the inquiry from the Paris prosecutor's office regarding Epstein's potential connections to France.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
DOJ Attaché/Magistrat de liaison américain U.S. Embassy, Paris

keyFacts: The Paris prosecutor's office made an inquiry to U.S. authorities about Jeffrey Epstein's potential connections to France.
The Southern District of New York prosecutors were actively handling the investigation into Epstein and his co-conspirators as of August 2019.
U.S. Department of Justice officials were coordinating to share information with French authorities to advance their investigation.
The email correspondence shows international law enforcement cooperation regarding the Epstein case shortly after his arrest.
